column2: al - funeral service for robert james jackson
column6: 2015 at 2:00 pm at radney-smith chapel with rev. jason gravette officiating. burial will be in evergreen cemetery in sylacauga
column9: 2015 at goodwater healthcare. he was preceded in death by wife
column10: doris ladeen jackson. he is survived by three nieces and five nephews. visitation will be monday june 22
column11: 2015 from 12:00 pm until 2:00 pm. at radney-smith funeral home memorial messages may be sent to the family at www. radneysmith. com. radney-smith funeral home in sylacauga
